entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h after midnight. Temperature rising to minus 22 by morning. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
